headline: Struggling in a Retail Vortex,  Fairway May Be Near the End
abstract: Speculation of the grocery chainâ€™s possible closings set off lamentations on social media, though some said the chain had lost its luster.
lead_paragraph: Fairway Market, the nearly century-old supermarket chain that is a New York institution, is known for its hard-to-find global offerings, low prices and no-frills demeanor.
